A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is easily ranked above the prequels\, and outscores its predecessor (VII) by a good stretch. The movie combines strong characters with interesting pasts\, intertwining plots that elevate the movie beyond popcorn\, and some truly amazing fights. Throw in a few good laughs and some real fan-theory trouncing\, and the movie is much fun and deep. There is a strong philosophical underpinning that will make TLJ a great conversational movie for generations to come.
